version_description: Welcome to a world of match-3 puzzle games and the magic of Harry Potter.
Welcome to a world of match-3 puzzle games and the magic of Harry Potter.

Magic is all around you in the latest release from Harry Potter: Puzzles & Spells!
-Compete against other Clubs for great rewards in our all-new Leagues!
-Upgrade your Spells in special puzzle levels, including Divination with Prof. Trelawney!
-Experience an updated look and feel for Win Streaks!

Magic is all around you in the latest release from Harry Potter: Puzzles & Spells!
-Compete against other Clubs for great rewards in our all-new Leagues!
-Upgrade your Spells in special puzzle levels, including Divination with Prof. Trelawney!
-Experience an updated look and feel for Win Streaks!

Expect the unexpected in the latest release from Harry Potter: Puzzles & Spells!
-Conquer new puzzles, including the introduction of the Mirror of Erised!
-Learn your opponents in Club Leagues with our Global Leaderboards!
-Get to know your Magical Creatures even better with updated design and UI!

Expect the unexpected in the latest release from Harry Potter: Puzzles & Spells!
-Conquer new puzzles, including the introduction of the Mirror of Erised!
-Learn your opponents in Club Leagues with our Global Leaderboards!
-Get to know your Magical Creatures even better with updated design and UI!

Step into the unknown with the latest release from Harry Potter: Puzzles & Spells!
-Dive deeper into the world of magic with an all-new set of levels!
-Take your magic to the next level with more Spell Upgrade Opportunity levels!
-Experience improved gameplay with bug fixes!

-Dive deeper into the world of magic with an all-new set of levels!
-Take your magic to the next level with more Spell Upgrade Opportunity levels!
-Experience improved gameplay with bug fixes!

The Magic is everywhere in the latest release from Harry Potter: Puzzles & Spells!
-Conquer new puzzles, and take care of Magical Creatures to upgrade your spells!
-Reduce your Gold Vault Timer by watching videos!
-Earn rewards and an all-new pet with your Daily bonus!
-Connect, play & invite friends on LINE!
-Vanquish obstacles with new Dragons in Club Leagues!

The Magic is everywhere in the latest release from Harry Potter: Puzzles & Spells!
-Conquer new puzzles, and take care of Magical Creatures to upgrade your spells!
-Reduce your Gold Vault Timer by watching videos!
-Earn rewards and an all-new pet with your Daily bonus!
-Connect, play & invite friends on LINE!
-Vanquish obstacles with new Dragons in Club Leagues!

The Wizarding World is new and exciting in the latest release from Harry Potter: Puzzles & Spells!
-Improved gameplay with bug fixes!

The Wizarding World is new and exciting in the latest release from Harry Potter: Puzzles & Spells!
-Improved gameplay with bug fixes!

Show off your abilities in the latest release from Harry Potter: Puzzles & Spells!
-Earn yourself fantastic rewards with brand new Events!
-Collect a BRAND NEW Creature with the new Limited Time album!
-Collaborate with your Club on the Daily Puzzle!
-Test your skills with all new Puzzles!

Show off your abilities in the latest release from Harry Potter: Puzzles & Spells!
-Earn yourself fantastic rewards with brand new Events!
-Collect a BRAND NEW Creature with the new Limited Time album!
-Collaborate with your Club on the Daily Puzzle!
-Test your skills with all new Puzzles!

Get in the spirit with the new Harry Potter: Puzzles & Spells Dark Arts Event!
-Earn fantastic rewards as you collect spiders along your journey.
-Be on the look out for exploding spider eggs that appear on the Puzzle board.

Introducing: House Legends!
-Play limitless levels when you’re at the end of the available Player Journey Puzzles
-Compete against fellow members of your House (Gryffindor, Ravenclaw, Hufflepuff, Slytherin) to earn amazing rewards!

Dive into magic with the latest release from Harry Potter: Puzzles & Spells
-Prove your puzzle-solving prowess by conquering all new Player Journey Puzzles!
-Coming soon: New additions to the Magical Creatures Album!

A festive new update from Harry Potter: Puzzles & Spells!
- Be on the lookout for a special Christmas Event!
- A SPECIAL Holiday Offer for a Limited Time!
- Prepare to earn more Trophies alongside your beloved Creature Companions!

Celebrate the New Year with the latest release from Harry Potter: Puzzles & Spells!
-Trigger a new & unique blast experience with your Creature on the game board!
-Explore deeper into the magical world than ever before with all new puzzles and scenes!
-Get ready for new Albums, new Creatures, and a BRAND NEW Pixie Event!

-Explore deeper into the magical world than ever before with all new puzzles and scenes!
-Get ready for new Albums, new Creatures, and a BRAND NEW Pixie Event!

Flex your puzzle skills with the latest release from Harry Potter: Puzzles & Spells!
-Take on all new special puzzle levels with a choice of spells to utilize!
-Expand your Match-3 prowess with additional Player Journey and House Legend levels!
-Coming Soon: Collect love potions in a very special limited-time Valentine’s Day event!

Flex your puzzle skills with the latest release from Harry Potter: Puzzles & Spells!
-Take on all new special puzzle levels with a choice of spells to utilize!
-Expand your Match-3 prowess with additional Player Journey and House Legend levels!
-Coming Soon: Collect love potions in a very special limited-time Valentine’s Day event!

Mischief is in the air in the latest release from Harry Potter: Puzzles & Spells!

Coming Soon: Unleash your inner prankster with the brand new Magical Mischief event! Send Pranks to rival Clubs to change up their gameplay! Earn bragging rights by sending the most Prank Boxes in your Club and cement your status as Mischief-Maker-in-Chief.

Mischief is in the air in the latest release from Harry Potter: Puzzles & Spells!

Coming Soon: Unleash your inner prankster with the brand new Magical Mischief event! Send Pranks to rival Clubs to change up their gameplay! Earn bragging rights by sending the most Prank Boxes in your Club and cement your status as Mischief-Maker-in-Chief.

Take a break from routine with the latest release of Harry Potter: Puzzles & Spells!
- Celebrate favorite moments and iconic scenes with the release of new Player Journey Levels!
- Prepare to earn extra Mischief Points from watching videos!
- Experience smoother gameplay with bug fixes and updates!

Get ready for more magic in the latest release from Harry Potter: Puzzles & Spells!
-Experience more chances to win with smaller cohorts in House Legends!
-Use Accio to summon your creature for help on puzzles!
-Coming Soon: Collect Phoenix Feathers in the brand new Phenomenal Feathers event!

Prepare to embrace the magic of the latest release from Harry Potter: Puzzles & Spells!
-Complete an all-new Magical Creatures Album to receive a Unicorn Foal!
-Conquer all-new Defense Against the Dark Arts puzzles, featuring Professor Lupin!
-Prove you have what it takes to beat an all new set of Player Journey Puzzles!
